GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.34 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit cc133e4f4bc225079198192623945bb872c08143, it was introduced in version v2.6.34 by commit 36e31b0af58728071e8023cf8e20c5166b700717. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: tcp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_tcp_thin_linear_timeouts.
